author: JamesWTruher
body:
Add tests for Get-Item to improve code coverage of the cmdlet. Additional tests for:
- literalpath parameter
- force parameter
- alternate streams
- dynamic parameter -filter
- exclude and include parameters
- Get-Item against registry drive
- Error conditions bad provider and bad drive

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @JamesWTruher can you updated the issue with the remaining tasks? Then I can go ahead an merge this change.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: Merging this PR as the issue #4148 already has a pending item for AccessDenied.

title: Improve code coverage for Get-Item cmdlet
